text: Pankhiraj (English:Lord of Birds; Bengali: পাঙ্খিরাজ) is a 1979 Bengali language Indian drama film directed by Pijush Basu, starring Uttam Kumar, Soumitra Chatterjee, Nandita Bose, Samit Bhanja, and Utpal Dutta. == Cast == * Uttam Kumar * Soumitra Chatterjee * Nandita Bose * Samit Bhanja * Santu Mukherjee * Utpal Dutta == References == == External links == *
title: Pankhiraj
